question: The gold medal in women's double trap event at the 2018 Commonwealth Games has been won by _________.
explanation: Shooter Shreyasi Singh won the gold medal in women's double trap event at the 2018 Commonwealth Games in Gold Coast. The bronze medal went to Scotland. She had won a Bronze medal at the 2014 Asian Games in Incheon in the double trap team event. She won the silver medal in double trap event at the 2017 Commonwealth Shooting Championships.
